definition: حبر ḥabara u (ḥabr) to gladden, make happy, delight (ه s.o.); -- ḥabira a (حبور ḥubūr) to be glad, happy II to embellish, refine, make workmanlike (هـ s.th.); to compose (هـ s.th.) in elegant style; to write, compose (هـ s.th.) حبر ḥibr ink│ام الحبر umm al-ḥibr squid, cuttlefish; حبر على ورق (waraq) mere ink on paper, of no effect (e.g., an agreement, a treaty) حبر ḥabr, ḥibr pl. احبار aḥbār a non-Muslim religious authority, 1earned man, scribe; hishop; rabbi│الحبر الاعظم the Pope; سفر الاحبار sifr al-a. Leviticus (Old Test.)
